End
CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
Option Compare Database   'Usar orden de base de datos en comparaciones de cadenas
Dim db As Database
Dim T_Oper As Recordset

Private Sub Botón38_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_Botón38_Click


    DoCmd.Close

Exit_Botón38_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_Botón38_Click:
    MsgBox Error$
    Resume Exit_Botón38_Click
    
End Sub


Private Sub Form_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
    Set db = CurrentDb()
    Clave_Ant = ClaveExamen.OldValue
    If Clave_Ant <> ClaveExamen Then
       Set T_Oper = db.OpenRecordset("Operaciones")
       T_Oper.Index = "Recibo"
       Do While T_Oper!Recibo = ReciboPago
          If T_Oper!Credencial = Credencial Then
             If RTrim(Left(T_Oper![Operacion], 12)) = Clave_Ant Then
                T_Oper.Edit
                T_Oper!Operacion = ClaveExamen + Space(12 - Len(ClaveExamen)) + Mid(T_Oper!Operacion, 13, 38)
                T_Oper.Update
                Exit Do
             End If
          End If
          T_Oper.MoveNext
          If T_Oper.EOF Or T_Oper!Recibo <> ReciboPago Then
             Exit Do
          End If
       Loop
    End If
End Sub

Private Sub Form_Open(Cancel As Integer)
Dim db As Database, FLogin As Form, TUser As Recordset, Forma As Form
   Set db = CurrentDb()
   Set Forma = Forms![F_Reasignacion_examenes]
   Set FLogin = Forms!login
   Set TUser = db.OpenRecordset("Usuarios")
   TUser.Index = "PrimaryKey"
   TUser.Seek "=", FLogin!UserID
   If Not TUser.NoMatch Then
      If IsNull(TUser!A_ReasEX) Or TUser!A_ReasEX = "N" Then
         MsgBox "El usuario no tiene privilegios de acceso"
         DoCmd.CancelEvent
      Else
         If TUser!A_ReasEX = "C" Then
            Forma.AllowEditing = False
            Forma.DefaultEditing = 3
         End If
      End If
   Else
      MsgBox "El usuario no tiene clave de acceso registrada"
      DoCmd.CancelEvent
   End If

End Sub

Private Sub Comando40_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_Comando40_Click


    Screen.PreviousControl.SetFocus
    DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, 10, , acMenuVer70

Exit_Comando40_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_Comando40_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_Comando40_Click
    
End Sub
